body.raw:
<InternalPageMenu sticky>
   <PathViewer>
    <PathViewerItem to="/"> CAE </PathViewerItem>
    <PathViewerItem to="/quality"> Qualité </PathViewerItem>
  </PathViewer>
  <InternalPageMenuItem to="/quality/general"> Qualité générale </InternalPageMenuItem>
  
  <InternalPageMenuItem to="/quality/frontend"> Qualité du frontend </InternalPageMenuItem>
  <InternalPageMenuItem to="/quality/api"> Qualité de l'API </InternalPageMenuItem>
  <InternalPageMenuItem to="/quality/ci"> Continous Integration </InternalPageMenuItem>
  <InternalPageMenuItem to="/quality/e2e"> Tests end-to-end </InternalPageMenuItem>
</InternalPageMenu>
